Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Tried the chicken soup and zucchini parmesan cheese soup. Both were about 8 euros for the large 500ml size. A little pricey, but the soups were delicious and made with fresh ingredients!

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Very tasty soup! Great for a energy boost during the day. As a meal, not very filling. Maybe portions could be bigger? Great to have with a special someone.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: The soup is beyond savory, the doses are bigger than they appear on the cups.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Great place for wide variety of wonderful soups. Menu changes everyday. Friendly team. Outside bench to sit and enjoy your hot soup. A great Stop by for a local soup recharge.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Very nice soup shop. It's really small, designed primarily for takeaway, but if you are lucky you can find a seat in one of the four small stools inside the shop or in the bench outside. I tried the mushroom soup in the larger cup, it was so good. Next time I will try two different soup in the small cup... I want to try them all.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Soup itself was good and tastes fresh. But too pricey for the soup. Even small pieces of bread were charged extra.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Love this place! It’s so great for a healthy and warm meal! They have vegetarian options and vegan options. Delicious baked bread. Nice salads and other veggie dishes. The soups are always so good!!!

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: many vegan soups ;) thats cool and you eat outside on a bench

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Pumpkin soup was top notch, paprika soup was so so, the cheese sticks are amazing and the pumpkin salad is also recommended

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Unfortunately quite pricey, but the soups are so good. Nothing like it on a cold day

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Great fresh soups. They let you try all the different variations, so you can choose the best one. :)

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Nice soup. The service was great and quick. Local place with a good option for a quick bite.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: We called into Soup at the end of the day and were surprised at the wonderfully creative and variety of menu there was. There is outside seating or inside. Tiny place but obviously very popular particularly around meal times. We don't …

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: One of the best soups in Amsterdam!

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Very Good, I suggest trying The Soup with  Indian Curry and Garam Masala.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Amazing place, it always has the soup that you’ll like. Also, they change their menu every day, so you can try many different options.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Great quality, taste and variety!! The best soup place ever :) The prices are high though and for a take-away place which in the end serves a soup, quite a high end establishment. Unfortunately, because I'd go there everyday  for a healthy snack .

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Delicious hot soup, so perfect on a cold day. I haven't had a bad soup in here yet they've all been amazing.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Fresh and delicious! We had light chicken soup with lemon and zucchini with salmon, lovely.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Good prices and tasty soups ✨

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Delicious, healthy and local food. Menu changes everyday and it’s always versatile! Very friendly staff too. During lunch time on a weekday, you might just need to wait in line.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Soup en Zo is my absolute favorite place for lunch.  Serving up a wide variety of fresh soups and salads, menu changes daily.  To-go style service: walk in, choose your soup (and/or salad) and you're on your way!  Fast, friendly service every time.  Highly recommend!

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Nice. Have a look at BioFutura.com for sustainable packaging.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Super good and well-labeled menu. When we found out that an ingredient I didn't like was in the too-warm soup I hadn't eaten yet, they exchanged it. Cozy! Delicious food! Only downside is that there are no tables, just chairs and a ledge, …

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Tasty soups, salads and sides. Vegan options are available. Always fresh, try it out :)

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Really fresh delicious soup. The place is very small so you can either check if you can grab a little stool to sit on while you eat, eat on their little bench outside, or take it to go and enjoy it elsewhere. They also have some nice …

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: This place has homemade soups that vary from day to day and come with a slice of great bread. Some of the soups we tried were a little under seasoned, and we wished that while we were trying to decide on our soups, the employee could’ve told us that we could sample them. That would have been very helpful.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text:
A great concept. Every day there are different soups. A large selection of vegan soups.
At lunchtime it is always very crowded, but it doesn't take long until you have your soup.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Very tasty soups, really good when you want a little snack for on the go. There are many vegan and vegetarian soups aswell and they prepare it fresh and thats why it tastes so great! I remember i also got some bread so i could dip it into my soup. Come here and get your soup!

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Good soup to get you through the winter months. This cute soup deli has a menu that changes daily and friendly staff who let you try before you buy. The only downside is that there is no seating so you will need to eat your yummy soup …

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Fantastic home made soups and salads... You can watch as they cut up fresh vegetables to make the soups.... All soups are freshly prepared and natural. Some may find it a little expensive however that's Amsterdam for you. Wonderful healthy option with different varieties each day.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: I ate there about two years ago. Was the best soup I ever had and the gut that served me was incredibly nice.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Amazing soup. Just the place to come, take away or eat at the site. Prices are ok and quality is super good. There are vegetarian and vegan options. They also have salads. Soup comes with bread (:

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: The location I went to was accidentally found while walking from Van Gogh Museum to the World trade center Amsterdam a bit south.  Happy accident! Great vegan lunch we had.  Shared large pumpkin soup and salad dish.  I've never had vegan …

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: The carrot soup was nice, but the green pepper pesto it came with was truly beautiful. Could have done with a little more of that considering the price. Overall a good place though and the staff are beautiful

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Enjoyed dinner at Finbarr's this evening. We predominately chose from the Sunday Fayre menu, but five of made a diverse choice of courses, all of which were first class with impeccable service. Here for lunch with a family member. A …

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Went once, on my last day in Amsterdam which is my only regret. Loved the Colombian soup that has broccoli. The salad was amazing too. I learnt about parsnip's existence which is mind-blowing. Their soups and salads change very often so …

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Soup en Zo was a warm, pleasant surprise on a cold night. The home-made soup (and every other option) are supported by the fresh ingredients that you see right there. They even have a cookbook of their recipes!

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: The rotating menu of soups is a great idea for the winter months , as it will allow you to try new options. I somehow managed to visit Soup en Zo twice yesterday. Try the carrot,potato and ginger soup. What seems ordinary is executed fantastically.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Been coming here for years. Soups are fantastic. Shop owner’s attitude towards masks and flouting the new law are not. Respect your customers & just put it on - this is not a discussion...

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Amazing little place with fresh soups for everyone, vegan to carnivore! Can't recommend this foodie gem enough. Great prices too for freshly made soups packed full of goodness.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: My go to place for lunch away from the office. Great soup and salads. Excellent choice for vegetarians, vegans and meat lovers alike. Long queues during lunch time, which is usually a good indication of quality. A bit on the expensive side though... but definitely worth both the wait and the money.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Best soup place in Amsterdam! When I lived in Amsterdam, I would travel a good half an hour out of my way to get to this place. Their Mexican tomato soup is the best soup I’ve had. I wish they’d come to London!

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: So fresh and so yummy! Very close to all the museums. Large portions and reasonable prices. Bread is a great fresh side as well! Must try the cheese twists next time.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Midium size looks small but it is very filling. Always very yummy. I would recommend to get an extra piece of bread. They have a good selection of vegan options.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Phenomenal Phind!!!!  In Amsterdam for the Weekend and the wife wasnt feeling well.  What better than some homemade soup.  We got 2 Large Soups as they were closing.  The Onion Soup and Split Pea.  Both OUT OF THIS WORLD and seasonings like fresh cilantro to top it off...YUMMM

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Fantastic selection, quick service, absolutely delicious products!  This place serves up steaming hot bowls of yummy goodness for carnivores, vegetarians, vegans, vege-cheat-ians, everyone!  Mostly a take-away spot, but there are a few …

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Great little soup kitchen. It has a changing menu with mostly vegan and vegetarian options. I also highly recommend the cheese sticks and quiches.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: My favourite place to stop in for quality soup in Amsterdam. My go to.. Pumpkin soup with cumin or Cauliflower and walnut. Love that they offer vegan options.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Amazing soup! We grabbed the lentil, the chickpea, and the tomato. Loved all three, which we shared. Perfect!

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: The soup is excellent, one of the best places with soup in Amsterdam. The location is very small and it's difficult to find a place to eat there. It's more a take-away.

Name: Soup en zo
Review Text: Best soup! Warmed up my soul yesterday on a windy cold Saturday. Price is good. Just around the corner of my hotel 🏩 I'll eat there every day probably 😊

Review Text: Small eatery with freshly prepared soups. Good place for take away. There're a few chairs but the place is very small. Better to take the soup and enjoy it by the canal.
